entry.title: New release for Postiz: Multiple LinkedIn accounts connect + small fixes
entry.content:
• LinkedIn has a mechanism: if you connect your social account (with a specific application), wait a while, and then connect another account with the same user. For example, connect a personal account, then connect a LinkedIn page. It will revoke the token of the other integration. For that, we have a new functionality that updates the access token to all the integrations in the organization that has the same root.
  • You can save drafts without adding all the fields.
  • Minor calendar visibility fixes.

entry.title: New release for Postiz: X long post
entry.content:
I just added the ability to write long posts if you have a premium account. When adding a new account, it saves the current verified state and, according to that, limits your post in the preview.

You can edit the settings from the channels menu and switch if it's verified or not.

entry.title: New release for Postiz: AI image
